body:

title: What's Your Favorite Candy?

replies.body: Mars bars all the way

replies.body: I like most candies, but not chocolate ones. (Except for M&M's.)
replies.body_tagged: I like most candies, but not chocolate ones. (Except for M&M's.)

replies.body:
Jahaj - Yeah some chocolate candies can get a bit too....chocolaty. But M&Ms have just the right amount of chocolate. 

Oraporo - Mars Bar? Interesting choice!

Retaliation - Never seen either before, so I might try them!

replies.body:
I picked jolly ranchers.
But seriously... theres this candy called ZotZ and they are the best fricken thing ever!
Thy have like a jolly rancher outside and then it keeps getting fizzy as you get into it more, then at the end it EXPLODES with fizzyness and its the best feeling ever!
If you ever see them, you have to get them, like.. Seriously

I picked jolly ranchers.

Thy have like a jolly rancher outside and then it keeps getting fizzy as you get into it more, then at the end it EXPLODES with fizzyness and its the best feeling ever!
If you ever see them, you have to get them, like.. Seriously
